title: Electoral Process (General Election) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2021

12th May, 2021 Statutory Instruments 183
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 40 OF 2021
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (General Election) (Election Date
and Time of Poll) Order, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in sections 28 and125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (General Title
Election) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2021.
2. The elections timetable specified in the Schedule is applicable Election
for the matters specified in that Schedule. timetable
3. A person shall not support a Presidential candidate for the Support of
purposes of a Presidential nomination specified in the Schedule Presidential
candidate
unless the person is registered as a voter in the province which the
person is representing.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
